contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the word "worthless" refers to all idols. This can be clarified in translation. Alternate translation: "Idols are worthless. I hate those who serve them" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-distinguish]])
contextId.glQuote: I hate those who serve worthless idols

contextId.occurrenceNote: This phrase distinguishes the full grown bulls from other younger cows. Alternate translation: "a bull that is full grown with horns and hooves" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-distinguish]])
contextId.glQuote: a bull that has horns and hooves
